title: David Brinkley was from wilmington.  Is the house where he was born (or family lived in at the time) still standing in Wilmington and if so what is the address?  Helping granddaughter in Charlotte with a school project and I would like to take a picture of the house.  I know where he is burried.  Thanks.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1326 The house is no longer there, though.
